gridworld.gui

Class ImageDisplay.TintFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.image.ImageFilter
      • java.awt.image.RGBImageFilter
        • gridworld.gui.ImageDisplay.TintFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageConsumer, java.lang.Cloneable
    Enclosing class:
    ImageDisplay

    private static class ImageDisplay.TintFilter
extends java.awt.image.RGBImageFilter
    An image filter class that tints colors based on the tint provided to the constructor (the color of an object).

    • Method Detail

      • filterRGB

        public int filterRGB(int x,
                     int y,
                     int argb)
        Description copied from class: java.awt.image.RGBImageFilter
        Subclasses must specify a method to convert a single input pixel in the default RGB ColorModel to a single output pixel.
        Specified by:
        filterRGB in class java.awt.image.RGBImageFilter
        Parameters:
        x - the X coordinate of the pixel
        y - the Y coordinate of the pixel
        argb - the integer pixel representation in the default RGB color model
        Returns:
        a filtered pixel in the default RGB color model.
        See Also:
        ColorModel.getRGBdefault(), RGBImageFilter.filterRGBPixels(int, int, int, int, int[], int, int)
